posts.post_content:
i have a schreck columbus t206 i just want to trade for some post-war needs. it has writing on his face but you can still make out the player fine, can't tell if its pencil or faded pen, back if fine (drum or back)...no paper loss or other major issues

oh btw, just kidding it's piedmont, if interested in this filler pm me please and i'll send a scan...-pat
